title: Hezbollah Commander Killed In Fresh Israeli Strikes On Beirut: Report
content: An Israeli airstrike on the southern suburbs of Beirut on Tuesday killed a Hezbollah commander who was a leading figure in its rocket division, two security sources in Lebanon said, as fears of a full-fledged war in the Middle East mounted.
summary: An Israeli airstrike on the southern suburbs of Beirut on Tuesday killed a Hezbollah commander who was a leading figure in its rocket division, two security sources in Lebanon said, as fears of a full-fledged war in the Middle East mounted.

title: Deadly Fungal Infections Are Causing A "Silent Pandemic", Scientists Warn
content: Fungal infections are evolving and becoming resistant to the medicines used to treat them, causing what some researchers are calling a "silent pandemic" that needs to be addressed urgently.
summary: Fungal infections are evolving and becoming resistant to the medicines used to treat them, causing what some researchers are calling a "silent pandemic" that needs to be addressed urgently.

title: Telegram Can Disclose User Data At Authorities' Requests, Says Co-Founder
content: Telegram can disclose users' data upon reasonable requests from authorities, the encrypted messaging service's co-founder Pavel Durov said on his Telegram channel.
summary: Telegram can disclose users' data upon reasonable requests from authorities, the encrypted messaging service's co-founder Pavel Durov said on his Telegram channel.

title: 'Zeta-Class': Japan's New Supercomputer Will Revolutionise Science
content: This groundbreaking technology, expected to be operational by 2030, will be a significant step forward in AI development and scientific research.
summary: This groundbreaking technology, expected to be operational by 2030, will be a significant step forward in AI development and scientific research.

title: Korean Man Arrested 16 Years After Burying Girlfriend In Cement On Balcony
content: A construction worker repairing a leak on the rooftop balcony stumbled upon a travel suitcase encased in concrete and bricks, containing the partially preserved remains of the victim.
summary: A construction worker repairing a leak on the rooftop balcony stumbled upon a travel suitcase encased in concrete and bricks, containing the partially preserved remains of the victim.

title: How Tensions Surging Between Israel, Hezbollah Could Be Devastating For All
content: For almost a year, Israel and Hezbollah have engaged in increasingly provocative cross-border skirmishes as onlookers warn that this escalating war of attrition could land the region in an all-out conflict.
summary: For almost a year, Israel and Hezbollah have engaged in increasingly provocative cross-border skirmishes as onlookers warn that this escalating war of attrition could land the region in an all-out conflict.

title: TikTok Bans Russia's RT, Sputnik For Acts Of 'Covert Influence Operations'
content: TikTok has banned accounts belonging to Russian state-owned media outlets RT and Sputnik, citing their engagement in "covert influence operations".
summary: TikTok has banned accounts belonging to Russian state-owned media outlets RT and Sputnik, citing their engagement in "covert influence operations".

title: Hidden Heat-Tolerant Corals Can Save Great Barrier Reef, New Research Shows
content: Just as individual humans handle stress differently, so do corals. Even coral colonies of the same species, growing side by side, vary in their tolerance to pressures such as heatwaves.
summary: Just as individual humans handle stress differently, so do corals. Even coral colonies of the same species, growing side by side, vary in their tolerance to pressures such as heatwaves.

title: 'Yoga Nidra' Works, Says MRI: IIT, AIIMS Researchers Uncover Brain Benefits
content: Yoga Nidra practice causes many changes in brain activity, including in areas involved in regulating emotions, mind wandering, and sleep.
summary: Yoga Nidra practice causes many changes in brain activity, including in areas involved in regulating emotions, mind wandering, and sleep.

title: Ghosts Of Beirut: 40-Year Shadow War, Spy Ops Between Israel And Lebanon
content: Israeli airstrikes on Monday killed at 492, including 35 children, in Lebanon, marking the deadliest attack on the country in nearly two decades.
summary: Israeli airstrikes on Monday killed at 492, including 35 children, in Lebanon, marking the deadliest attack on the country in nearly two decades.

title: Elon Musk Calls Italy PM Giorgia Meloni 'Authentic, Honest' At Awards Gala

title: Meeting With PM Modi That Donald Trump Announced Did Not Happen
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump had said that he was going to meet Prime Minister Narendra Modi during his visit here but they did not meet.

title: Donald Trump Helps Mother Of 3 With Grocery Bill, Sparks Mixed Reactions
content: The video shows Trump giving $100 to a Pennsylvania mother of three to help with her grocery bill during a campaign stop on September 23.

title: 1982 Lebanon War: Israeli Invasion Which Gave Birth To Hezbollah Militants
content: Israeli airstrikes targeted southern and eastern Lebanon, as well as the capital city of Beirut, on Monday, killing 450 people and injuring over 1,500. This was the deadliest Israeli attack on Lebanon since the 2006 war with Hezbollah.
summary: Israeli airstrikes targeted southern and eastern Lebanon, as well as the capital city of Beirut, on Monday, killing 450 people and injuring over 1,500. This was the deadliest Israeli attack on Lebanon since the 2006 war with Hezbollah.

title: "Grateful" For PM Modi's Support For Ukraine's Territorial Integrity: Zelensky
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky lauded Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday for his "clear support" of Ukraine's sovereignty and territorial integrity.

title: Scientists Discover Ghostly 'Spookfish' That Prowls Pacific Ocean Floor
content: Scientists in New Zealand said Tuesday they have discovered a new species of "ghost shark", a type of fish that prowls the Pacific Ocean floor hunting prey more than a mile down.
summary: Scientists in New Zealand said Tuesday they have discovered a new species of "ghost shark", a type of fish that prowls the Pacific Ocean floor hunting prey more than a mile down.

title: Coldplay's Chris Martin Performs New Song At Vegas Bar In Disguise
content: Coldplay frontman Chris Martin surprised fans at Dino's Lounge in Las Vegas on Saturday when he performed the band's new song, All My Love dressed in a ginger wig and oversized glasses.
summary: Coldplay frontman Chris Martin surprised fans at Dino's Lounge in Las Vegas on Saturday when he performed the band's new song, All My Love dressed in a ginger wig and oversized glasses.

title: Boeing Offers 30% Pay Hike Directly To Striking Workers, Angers Unions
content: Boeing Co offered a 30% pay bump directly to striking workers, angering union leaders, as the embattled planemaker tries to overcome a debilitating strike that has shut down plants across the Pacific Northwest.
summary: Boeing Co offered a 30% pay bump directly to striking workers, angering union leaders, as the embattled planemaker tries to overcome a debilitating strike that has shut down plants across the Pacific Northwest.

title: How Iran Immigrant Maky Zanganeh Is Now A Self-Made Billionaire In US
content: Maky Zanganeh became a billionaire after shares of Summit Therapeutics, where she serves as co-CEO, soared following positive trial data for its promising cancer drug.
summary: Maky Zanganeh became a billionaire after shares of Summit Therapeutics, where she serves as co-CEO, soared following positive trial data for its promising cancer drug.
